website_summaries.verdict: A good gun safe with room for a basic gun collection and ammunition, marred by a janky electronic keypad.
pros: Sturdy, if not foolproof, locking mechanism with backup keys
Adjustable shelves allow for several configuration options
Bolts securely to the floor, and inset hinges further deter thieves
cons: Electronic lock has a few foibles, fails frequently and sometimes arrives disconnected
Paint is vulnerable to chips and scratches

customer_reviews.title: delivered fresh out of the box, no freight damage ...
customer_reviews.text: delivered fresh out of the box, no freight damage. The electronic lock does not work. No matter how many ties I've tried the red lid comes on and will not open. the manual that comes with the product does not have a phone number or web address to contact support or customer service. Only thing they have is an address to order more keys at ten bucks per key. toms gunsmithing llc
customer_reviews.author: Tom studer

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase this safe!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this safe back in July, worked great right out the box and loved it. Today the key pad stopped working, but only the first 5 numbers all others seem to work fine. Called customer service at gun safe.com stayed on hold for literally less than a minute and a half when I'm given the recorded message that all customer service reps were busy and hangs up with no option to leave a message.
customer_reviews.author: Chell

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot of stuff, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a big, sturdy, heavy, intimidating looking safe that holds a surprising amount of stuff! The price was great and it absolutely serves its purpose. I highly recommend. Also, i got a motion sensor light to go inside and i have to say it is really convenient to open it up and just have a light come right on. I'd say treat yourself to that too.
customer_reviews.author: Randolph

customer_reviews.title: now for the safe the gap around the door is going to be easy to pry so I plan drop some metal shivs ...
customer_reviews.text: I know there are people out there who expect a $2-3000 equivalent safe... I think For 500.00 absolutely worth it! and serves my purpose perfectly.. OK! now for the safe the gap around the door is going to be easy to pry so I plan drop some metal shivs to make it difficult. It's 250 lbs I'm guessing it will hold approximately 10-12 long guns comfortably and accessibly with shelf room for other handguns :) It's well built and very sturdy..Thanks God Bless, I hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Judson Maillard

customer_reviews.title: update to my previous review
customer_reviews.text: want to say thank you to amazon for replacing the damaged product I first received. I am loving every thing about my new stack on gun safe. its easy to use and quite roomy yet doesn't take up a lot of room exactly what I had hoped for. Want to say thank you to the delivery service amazon used the man was kind and did not damage my product I'd like to recommend this delivery service to amazon for they did a stand up job delivering and taking care to not damage my gun safe he took his time and even waited while I double checked for any damages. So yes I recommend this delivery service with 5 STAR review.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Gayheart

customer_reviews.title: Poor Electronics and Service
customer_reviews.text: The electronics on this safe are pure junk. I am on my third malfunction. Now it recognizes no codes, even the factory code to open it. Stack-On doesn't respond to email. I don't know why I bothered to write in. Their customer service is poor, being non-responsive. If you need a firearm safe that will reliably allow you to access your items in an emergency, you should look to another brand. Don't discover your first malfunction when you need to open your safe quickly!
customer_reviews.author: DCI

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the money
customer_reviews.text: This safe is a very good for the money. Heavy door and pretty roomy on the inside. I bolted it to both the wall and the floor with 6" lag bolts. The sides are thinner but a thief would need a power saw to cut it open. Our area has experienced recent robberies and this safe has given my family a sense of security for our valuables when we leave home.
customer_reviews.author: Bon M

customer_reviews.title: Good product at a fair price
customer_reviews.text: Very good gun safe. It is exactly as represented and is a good safe for the money, . It arrived on time, as scheduled. We are very happy with the safe. It was easy to set up and enter our digital combination.
customer_reviews.author: Edward J

customer_reviews.title: Bent Deadbolts
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, the deadbolts are bent and 2 do not retract all the way, 2 pegs that held shelves were broken, 2 separate barrel rests were broken off. and the inside lining on the doors lower half is severely wrinkled and not smooth like the rest of the safe. Poor craftsmanship overall. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Fred Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Electrical doesn't work so you can only open it with ...
customer_reviews.text: Electrical doesn't work so you can only open it with the backup key. Had to call company and need to find time to take out all the wiring and replace combination board to make it work. Should be interesting to see if I can get it working properly... Should not have to do this with a new product..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heard the lock was bad so, tried to return it
customer_reviews.text: Heard the lock was bad so, tried to return it, never received it, contacted seller. several emails later. it was returned & I was charged over $100 restocking fee. I got one from Walmart.com. bigger, better cheaper & it's excellent. Walmart also provided better customer service. I would not recommend you deal with this seller due to the customer service & the cost of this safe.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: I'm pleased . Great value
customer_reviews.text: Good safe for the money. If u have scoped guns it holds way less but it's perfect if you have 10 guns or less to store on one side and ammo and other collectibles on the other side. Easy delivery ,setting up code was easy, 2 backup keys . There's even room the buy the Velcro pistol holders to hang on the safe door . It holds 8 easy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: terrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: Way overpriced. terrible customer service. you can get a better bigger one or the same one, same name brand for a way better price on Walmart.com. I wouldn't recommend this vendor but, the safe is a good one if you get it cheaper somewhere else otherwise it's not worth it at all for this price
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: It came a week early and I absolutely love it. No damage and works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I just received my safe. It came a week early and I absolutely love it. No damage and works perfectly. The electronics work perfect so far. I would highly recommend this safe to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Stanis

customer_reviews.title: Great Gun Safe
customer_reviews.text: Great Safe for the Price. Stack on doesn't make too many higher quality safes but this one dose very well for the price and size.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Calderaz

customer_reviews.title: Great Value.
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly what I was looking for - a safe and secure place to store my. The electronic lock is simple to use. I couldn't find a better value for the money at this size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Safe
customer_reviews.text: Good Safe but not great. The muzzle holders for the rifles are too high for a AR 15 with an adjustable stock. The pegs that hold up the shelf don't stay in well without a lot of weight on the shelves holding them. But the safe is roomy and holds a ton of Guns and other equipment.
customer_reviews.author: BLB

customer_reviews.title: So far no major complaints about it. Only things ...
customer_reviews.text: So far no major complaints about it. Only things that somewhat bothers me is the cheap pin pad it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: Xai Vang

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Handy little safe; only problem is that my gun collection has outgrown it!!
customer_reviews.author: Chilanga

customer_reviews.title: This is great. Super easy to program
customer_reviews.text: This is great. Super easy to program. I would buy another one if I ever needed one .Best thing I ever got from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing shelf supports.
customer_reviews.text: I received the safe in great condition. However it was missing one set of tabs that hold the shelves in place. I hope I can find a phone number to call them.
customer_reviews.author: Penny K.

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Very Nice and price was even better. Can leave home and not have to worry anymore. Good quality safe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does everything I expected. I have 14 long guns and 7 hand guns in the safe now.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Takeaway scratches, the keys do not open. Customer service attitude is very poor
customer_reviews.author: fanglinmin

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: inside padding put in very sloppy, had a screw missing from one of the rails that supports the shelf
customer_reviews.author: Charles Willette

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Needed one for a while. This one is priced right and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: STAN E.

customer_reviews.title: but it's a good safe for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's not Fort Knox, but it's a good safe for the price.
customer_reviews.author: The Rabbit Whisperer

customer_reviews.title: The driver was very helpful and placed the safe right ...
customer_reviews.text: The driver was very helpful and placed the safe right where I wanted it. Once the 9 volt battery was installed the unit functioned perfectly
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Varner

customer_reviews.title: After purchasing this so called safe I found a better built one
customer_reviews.text: After a little more research on safes. I am somewhat disapointed at this so called safe. All it is, is a security closet. The door is about 1/8". It looks big on the insight, because it hides the locking mechanism. Some what of a decent safe, should have at least a 1/4" thick door, before you get to the locking mechanism enclosure. After purchasing this so called safe I found a better built one, water and fire proof, in WalMart, for about the same price. I guess at this point, Ot is just a handicap for burglars to get to my guns.
customer_reviews.author: DJE

customer_reviews.title: It will definitely keep your guns stored with a sturdy enough locking mechanism that you don't have to worry ...
customer_reviews.text: This safe does exactly what I need it to. For the price I paid, I got what I would expect and then some. It's not a $2k safe, so don't expect it to keep out a hardened criminal or well equipped thief. It will definitely keep your guns stored with a sturdy enough locking mechanism that you don't have to worry about children or nosy guests getting in there without power tools.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Fankhauser

customer_reviews.title: A very good safe for the price
customer_reviews.text: A very good safe for the price, delivered on time with no damage. I am very satisfied with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Raul Delgado

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: the bolts don't seem to retract to a completely even length for all three. but it does seal properly so I'm nitpicking. also seems to catch in a corner causing the door to stick a bit. so, its good, though not the smoothest opening safe Ive seen. gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Very good security safe for the money.
customer_reviews.text: The item was shipped via freight and the carrier was very good at taking the skid and wheeling the safe to the garage. The safe itself is solid but there were some paint chips that was due to shotty painting, not shipping. I researched many safes prior to this purchase. This safe comes with mounting hardware and is drilled for a solid mount to the floor. It also comes with a back-up key in case the battery dies for the electronic lock. The shelves are strong enough to hold pistols but I'd think twice prior to storing items with a lot of weight (such as ammunition). I will buy another one as it becomes available again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Venturino

customer_reviews.title: Better Safe Than Sorry
customer_reviews.text: I had a small dresser top gun safe before & it just wasnt strong enough to protect my valuables cause we had a break in & they busted the dressertop safe right open with no problems, luckily I had my valuables with us when they broke in & all they got was an empty box. So I bought this Stack On 22 Gun Safe at a great price & it has been wonderful its very well built & fireproof plus it has a programable electronic keypad lock & a master key to get in it incase you forget your code. This is a awesome gun safe in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: KsBadBoy59

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Locked nice first time, but after 2 months the electric kay doesn’t works
customer_reviews.author: Beka Goginashvili

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great safe. Glad I finally have piece of mind when I'm out.
customer_reviews.author: Wilhelm B. Young

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent unit, well made, plenty of room I am happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: mark ringuette

customer_reviews.title: Not fireproof....constantly replacing batteries
customer_reviews.text: I got this safe to store a few firearms and some valuables. I was very happy with the interior of the safe. The shelves were easy to customize to my liking. Just understand that you get for what you pay and what I mean by that is that this is not a fireproof safe by any means and if someone really wanted to gain access to it, I have a feeling a few swings with a halogen bar or axe might just serve as a key. The other pitfall is the battery situation. I find that the batteries are constantly dying so I have resorted to just using the key.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Baer

customer_reviews.title: Would defiantly not recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.text: Digital lock doesn't work properly. Half the numbers on the pad do not work for no reason and require the key to unlock and reset from the inside.. This happens quite a bit and when you don't expect it. Would only use for storage but not to keep home defense guns in it as it might not open when you need it most. Would defiantly not recommend to anyone. Only reason I gave it two stars is because I still use it as storage.
customer_reviews.author: Cashbox

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Dings on top edge of safe like so many warned about in previous reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome safe for the money
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping...Awesome safe for the money...Point, I've noticed a lot of reviews saying the electronic lock doesn't work..In my own opinion, of course, it's very important you read the instructions when setting the your own pin...Push the red button, set your code followed by the *. Then when you close it, put in your new pin, without the *, but with the #...It has a timeout of 10 seconds, then 5 minutes, if you enter you code correctly...So, 1234#...Hope this helps...Great safe!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kendall A. Guffey

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Everything was as pictured/expected
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Everything was as pictured/expected. The safe arrived extremely quickly and weeks ahead of the estimated delivery date. Only reason for 4-stars is the side of the safe had a minor scratch/ding from shipping. Better boxing could increase this item to 5-stars. Electronic key code is easy to program and shelving was easy to get adjusted. I used the screws in the floor of the installed location and that was simple as well. All in all set up took only minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made safe
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made safe ....problem is it comes with only two mounting holes in the floor of the safe...you can not mount it solidly to your concrete slab...it will move when pushed...worst thing is the customer service dept at Stack On says all their safes have two holes.... BUT.... I have another Stack On safe with a mounting hole in each corner....so they are liars or fools ....or both ?
customer_reviews.author: Ed Matodobra

customer_reviews.title: good safe !
customer_reviews.text: safe came early. delivery good and on time. initially the key pad didn't work..noticed the ribbon cable attached to the key pad circuit board was coming loose, reinserted, works like a charm....very happy with this safe ..would highly recommend...would give 5 stars if it wasn't for the key board connection...( I have a strong electronics back ground)
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: J Lee
customer_reviews.text: The safe has no additional shelves you must modify it . it's light and not so heavy 400-600 lb. great starter safe
customer_reviews.author: J. Lee

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE FOR THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Nice safe with plenty of room for all my guns and ammo. Plenty room left over for safe keeping of money, jewelry and important documents. For $400.00 it a winner hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Nice safe. Not fireproof
customer_reviews.text: Nice safe. Not fireproof, but it will do. I doubt I'll get 22 long guns in here... If anyone is wondering, the door can be removed to save weight when moving it floor to floor. Take the door inner panel off and there are 4 large bolts on the hinges.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Ackerman

customer_reviews.title: it was perfect. Otherwise
customer_reviews.text: Came with some defects. But customer service has been helpful. Just wish, since it came from the factory, it was perfect. Otherwise, so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: RKM

customer_reviews.title: Safety first.
customer_reviews.text: While I know it isn't a top line safe it surely suits my needs at an affordable price. It definitely seems sturdy enough to thwart most thieves. It keeps my firearms safely locked away from my children while still allowing me quick and easy access; which is what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money
customer_reviews.text: No issues with the safe. Great product for the money. It can be broken into, but it would take significant effort. I had to remove baseboards to fasten it to the wall. It opens fast, easy to program, and quality materials for the price. Easy to attach to the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: great safe
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with this afe and have had no problems with it! The safe wa even placed exactly where I wanted it! Great buy and it holds a lot!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. On-time delivery. Big space for storage. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: DK/WW

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The gun safe is a good item;no issues with product.
customer_reviews.author: John L. Ouellet

customer_reviews.title: Great Safe for the price
customer_reviews.text: I researched gun safes for several weeks, checked local gun stores and this was by far the best priced and best value I could find. Had the safe for a month and really love it. It is easy to open and has a nice storage system with shelves you can organize as you see fit. I have organized all my ammo and guns in a safe place.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: The locking mechanism is fantastic. There's no way anybody is getting into this ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. No problems, everything works as it should. Way cheaper than most retailers. The locking mechanism is fantastic. There's no way anybody is getting into this will regular tampering.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle J. Cogan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product. Heavy enough to make it very difficult ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product. Heavy enough to make it very difficult for someone to take. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Fine safe for the money
customer_reviews.text: Safe is ok. Can't expect too much at the $550 range. Mine came damaged but I repaired it instead of dealing with returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan McCombs

customer_reviews.title: I thought the inside was bigger I could only fit ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought the inside was bigger I could only fit three shelves. You have to put shot guns up front because they don't fit with the shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford Hurst

customer_reviews.title: Great and Delivered
customer_reviews.text: This safe was not only a great price...but delivered to my door!! Perfect!! Holds all my guns and then some. Great condition!! Great price!!
customer_reviews.author: Lildawnp

customer_reviews.title: but very nice for a starter
customer_reviews.text: Not a top of the line safe, but very nice for a starter.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Easler

customer_reviews.title: I love it! And delivery couldn't have been better
customer_reviews.text: Safe was exactly as described. I love it! And delivery couldn't have been better!
customer_reviews.author: Faith Weedling

customer_reviews.title: Packaging said GUN SAFE on it.
customer_reviews.text: I just got the safe today. I am sure it is fine. But I only ordered after a number of purchasers told me it shows up in a plain box. Well it showed up with a picture of a gun safe and big letters that say 11-22 gun safe on it. Companies need to be clear. That is a MASSIVE security and safety problem, especially for a cheaper safe that is easier to defeat. Thank you. My entire apartment complex now knows I have a gun safe and thinks I have at least 11 guns in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Skat

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive my new safe. It came carefully wrapped and protected. When I finally got seize to opening the box a few days after delivery I found the safe door out of alignment. The door scrapes the bottom when you open it. I have no idea what the long term affect of this will be. It's as if the safe is 'out of square'. Also had several dents on the body.
customer_reviews.author: David M Grove

customer_reviews.title: Be wary
customer_reviews.text: Be wary....this safe has a bad habit of having faulty electronic lock
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: came damaged on top right corner and door all shaking while its closed
customer_reviews.author: Aimhigh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality budget priced safe. Free shipping really made the price compelling.
customer_reviews.author: Tony D

customer_reviews.title: safe came as promise but when it ship it came ...
customer_reviews.text: safe came as promise but when it ship it came in a huge box with gunsafe sign on it, thanks fir letting my neghbors know i hvae guns
customer_reviews.author: M D

product_meta.title: Stack-On SS-22-MB-E SS22 Gun Safe, 22, Black
product_meta.description:
Stack-On's Non – Fire SS-22-MB-E 22-Gun Fully Convertible Security Safe with Electronic Lock is tested and listed as California Department of Justice firearms safety devices that meets the requirements of California Penal Code Section 12088 and the regulations issued. This safe has 2-way locking– 1” steel live action locking bolts –up to 6 locking points and has a fully carpeted interior. This safe has large, steel locking bolts, concealed hinges and hinge side steel dead bolts that provide added security. The concealed hinges have been engineered to allow for greater access to the safe’s contents. Stack-On's safes have patented molded barrel rests that will not deteriorate or compress over time. The contour of the barrel rest will accommodate rifles as well as side-by-side shotguns.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Stack-On's Non – Fire SS-22-MB-E 22-Gun Fully Convertible Security Safe with Electronic Lock is tested and listed as California Department of Justice firearms safety devices that meets the requirements of California Penal Code Section 12088 and the regulations issued. This safe has 2-way locking– 1” steel live action locking bolts –up to 6 locking points and has a fully carpeted interior. This safe has large, steel locking bolts, concealed hinges and hinge side steel dead bolts that provide added security. The concealed hinges have been engineered to allow for greater access to the safe’s contents. Stack-On's safes have patented molded barrel rests that will not deteriorate or compress over time. The contour of the barrel rest will accommodate rifles as well as side-by-side shotguns.
feature_bullets: Holds 22 rifles or shotguns up to 54 inches tall, or 11 firearms and storage, or all storage
Exterior has a black epoxy paint finish with chrome accents and silk-screen on the door
Electronic lock includes operational lights for open, low battery warning and incorrect entry

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars119 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
